[HiBuy Coins] are time limited items that can be used to draw rewards in [HiBuy Treasure Hunt], with a chance to earn precious rewards. After the event ends, unused [HiBuy Coins] will be returned as <color=#00fff0>Gold</color> at the ratio of <color=#00fff0>1:250</color>. This kind of weekly events are only available since day 4 after server launch.

Each draw in HiBuy Treasure Hunt grants [HiBuy Pts] x10. [HiBuy Pts] can be exchanged for limited items at the [Exchange Store]. After the event ends, the [Exchange Store] will be closed, and [HiBuy Pts] will be returned as [Gold] at the ratio of <color=#00fff0>1:5000</color>. This kind of weekly events are only available since day 4 after server launch.

Tragedy often begins without warning, 
with doom reaching out its hand and planting the seeds with a secretive smile... 
It is the pearl of the sea, the miracle of the North - Byanis. 
Thanks to the open political and business environment, 
the city attracts a large number of talents from this world and 
is a place where all people look forward to and aspire to.

The lightless night enveloped Byanis, 
and the entire city seemed to be covered with a pure veil of blackness. 
The light of the "Pearl of the Sea" was dimmed in the hidden blackness, 
 and in the darkness of the night were the beasts that bared their teeth.

The oath of a betrayer is not to be trusted. 
They are vipers lurking in the shadows, and 
 when you are caught in the darkness of the unseen 
you must move forward with caution. 
The creeping darkness is lurking in the depths of the dark.

Although those icy and ruthless enemies 
 would not give up their attacks easily, 
Byanis was not so easily defeated either. 
 The Black Dragon Legion apparently did not recognize this, 
and soon, the battle went into overdrive 
as the tug-of-war of positions began and 
the most brutal aspect of the war was drawn to a close.

"Knights, what makes them noble? 
In battle, they kill the enemy for the sake of justice, 
and sacrifice their lives in the battlefield. In life, they abide by virtues, 
"humility" "honor" "sacrifice" "valor" "mercy " "soul," "honesty," and "justice. 
Even without the oath of chivalry, it is necessary to adhere to the spirit of chivalry." 
--Holy Knight

"Despite the entrance of human reinforcements, 
the Black Dragon Legion's offensive remained fierce 
and could even be described as... crazy. 
It was until Darkwing Garcon, who was personally present on the battlefield, 
revealed the news from another world, 
things became confusing again.

A surreal atmosphere enveloped the city, and 
before dawn was the time when darkness was thickest. 
Some people had ambitions, 
some had evil intentions, 
some were determined, 
others were mending their ways, 
others were writing history in blood, and 
all characters from different sides were in action.

The righteous aspire to die in battle and find a home, 
while the living have nowhere to go. 
Ignorance is the result of not having been truly afraid. 
Witnessing real fear is what makes people grow. 
Under the moonlight, huge figures rampage, 
but cannot break through the light of justice.

The flames of the Darkwing set the sky on fire, 
but they could not break the protection of the Shield of Glory. 
The knight of glory is defeated, 
but will never fall.

The dark night is overlaid with shadows and dark clouds cover the stars. 
The sea of blood they waded through flooded both knees, and 
all the blood surplus flowing in the world 
originated from Saffron.

The four seasons are alternating and everything is always the same. 
In the alternation of the wheel of time, 
everyone hides their secrets. 
Facing the unknown, 
heroes often overcome their fears and 
find the real answers.

When the stars 
in the firmament light up the first enlightenment that 
falls in with that expectation of the reality of hope, 
the tragedy of the past will replay again.

The tide of darkness has begun, the 
power of evil has long been quietly invading the dragon race. 
And it is predictable that the destiny of the 
Darkwing Garcon, 
is to be "redemption" soon.

The terrible prophecy has opened a gap from him, and 
he needs to face his destiny, 
even if it means offering his life.

The old homeland, the top of the mountains, speak before forgetting.
 I need to go forward, the strife and chaos, the upper shock of the nine heavens. 
Deep caves, spirits and monsters, the abyss of sorrow. 
The red heat is like blood, the dragon descendants choke, the night sleepless. 
The sunken hall, the black-winged king, the evil dragon demon flame.

Finally, 
under the guidance of fate, they came to the blue light forest, 
and they will also write a new chapter.

The night moon climbs the branches and 
the shadows hide in the darkness. 
In the unseen place, 
the waiting dark shadows bring advice.

The crown representing the kingship has long been left behind, and 
the appearance of the redeemer is like a 
dawn's light illuminating the way forward.

Corruption, depravity. 
The power of evil is like wearing a hazy veil. 
The crowd can feel that change but it is difficult to identify the cause of decay.

The hidden spirit of the jungle 
blocked the path of the warriors, 
but the real test had just begun.

The illusion of reality is like a mirror caught in reality, 
each reflecting a different side of people.

No one can guarantee a perfect destiny, and 
the flames of misery 
are quietly burning the sacred tree. 
Everyone wants to know why.

The truth gradually emerged and the 
appearance of the god of nature led the warriors in a new direction. 
No one knew the expression under his mask.

Chaos is brewing on the desert. 
The news of the emergence of the Fountain of Eternity attracts the attention of many people. 
The mysterious conspiracy really plays out.

The source material is the embodiment of the world will of this world. 
When this world faces a real threat, and 
it will truly come in the bell of destruction and the wave of rebirth.

The silhouette of time crops out a horrific reality of how a powerful enemy from the 
dark side can do such amazing things 
when they appear.

In the middle of the mysterious desert, 
the crowd encountered an unprecedented crisis. 
People who have not experienced it can not understand. 
Countless people died in the desert. 
You can feel only the horror.

Bringing destruction and fear to their enemies, the 
xenos are very good at doing these things. 
They are entrenched all over the world and 
once the xenos have living space, 
they will bring about the extinction of entire regions.

It is the first withered leaf of autumn. 
It is the first streak of cold snow in winter. 
It is the ruler of fear and death. 
It is the representative of the darkness that comes to the human world.

Pests bite people not out of malice, 
but because they want to sustain life. 
Greedy people also feed on greed.

The mysterious executioner always takes lives silently. 
You never know who will be the ultimate beneficiary. 
Although the Fountain of Eternity is just around the corner, 
the most important thing right now is to escape.

The guidance of the elves will guide 
the crowd to the mysterious 
land of strange totems whose 
mysterious race 
will gradually unveil its face.

Any living creature is spiritual. 
Any creature has intelligence. 
The cost of underestimating them can be great.

The wonderful aroma 
led the crowd to death. 
It is 
a terrible thing to die in your sleep.

Holy light cannot always shine on the earth, 
but the river will clear the gloom and 
follow the direction of the voice that 
will open the door to destiny.

The more beautiful the flower is, the scarier it may be. 
It is not a wise choice to step into the 
garden of death.

The power of mortals is limited. 
Even the strongest will can not resist the power of God. 
A huge figure descended from the sky. 
The crowd felt the power of God for the first time.

The glory of the Norwich family 
continues to be written in Bellows. 
The mighty god of rivers is dead, 
but Bellows is the proof that he is alive.

Fate is so intriguing. 
Even if they are far apart, 
they will meet again sooner or later. 
Even the powerful gods cannot escape the destiny.

The towering mountains 
are the birthplace of legendary magic, from which 
countless legends are written 
and which may bring unexpected rewards.

The ghosts floating in the distance 
The air is filled with a highly toxic miasma. 
Where is this transported? 
Unknown fear grips the front.

This seems to be a lair, 
but there is no way back. 
The air of despair is spreading and 
moving forward is the only hope.

The faint and dim light 
the rotten and damp smell 
after despair 
death may be the end

The old castle, bathed in blood, 
seems to tell the story of its former glory
...

As Bellows quelled the civil unrest and drove away the dragon invaders 
for a while, her personal reputation reached its peak among the people. 
However, in order to prevent the black dragon from retaliation after becoming stronger in the acquisition of Rune, 
the human senior leaders decided to crush the dragon forces of the Longmire Island.

The soul of the dragon bone, the god of eternal life. 
Deep mountains and low valleys, no fallen sacred. 
The chaos of heaven and earth, the great enemy all fall. 
The sword of the brave, the long sleep of dusk.

With a grave tone, 
the prophet said, 
"The moon that hangs high in the heavens, 
tonight, there is no wind nor clouds; 
the spirits that wander in the distant past, 
tonight, 
there is no sound nor breath; in the distant Kalisia, 
the ancient throne of the elves, 
and 
the high tower of white stone that towers above the wall of clouds, 
when the stars return to their places, 
all things will belong to Kalisia.

Expectant wonders burn in those bright flames, 
full of adventure and 
not yet tinged with fear; 
rows of sphinx feet, 
the road clearly leads one to those walls and 
corner towers that tremble faintly at the sound of the distant seven-stringed harp. 
This is the land - Aztec.

Growing up to be a dragon
I never thought that it was not death that separated us, but resurrection. My dear Guha, where are you?
Carnivorous deserts have great treasures buried in them, but they still don't stop people from going there.
All those who dare to covet the power of the dragons will be destroyed. Hmm? Have you ever seen this crystal?
Hey hey hey hey, have you ever seen a man in black armor with a burning giant sword? I want to kill him!
Who wouldn't want to experience a big dance party?! You have to wear a red ballgown! Hehe, let me help you!
It's been a while since I've practiced marksmanship, and my skills have regressed quite a bit. Can you put an apple on your head?
I once had a fan who was obsessed with my gorgeous dance moves, and I heard that he went to another continent and became a big-name traveler. Can you send him a message for me?
Apparitions arise frequently and the void emerges. Where exactly will the Creator's Child appear?
If you think you are qualified, come and challenge me at Byanis.
Do you also want to become a member of the Order of Byanis? Then you need to show some strength!
Huh? I heard you're going into the Sighing Desert? Bring along a few more partners if you can!
Head wolf? Hmph, it's just a mouse to me. You should try the claws and teeth of a giant dragon!
The Fountain of Eternity has surprisingly started to wither and the creatures in the Desert of Sighs have become abnormal. What is the reason for this?
At some point, my sword stopped burning and I wanted to find a way to be able to extinguish it.
My brother Vaccaro was as stubborn as my father and refused to leave the damn Longmire Island.
Want to compete against Johnson in pitching? Ha ha, you can't beat me.
Damned orcs! How dare you take away my coconut! Don't you know that Lord Vicky likes coconuts the most?
I want Sia to know that I'm fine, but I can't leave here, so can I trouble you?
I have a very poor sense of direction! Maybe it's because I spin in circles a lot.
I hate Camille. His anger burned out Yami's bird's nest! Do you have any ideas?
Hmm? Uh... Um, I think it was at the tavern, right? Or was it Emily's house?
Can you understand how it feels to have a fresh duck fly away from my mouth? I love eating ducks!
I heard that you humans wear shoes so that you can run faster? So I want to have a pair of shoes too.
The most important thing a soldier needs on the battlefield is a sharp weapon, but mine was rusty.
That was my month's worth of loot, and it was stolen like that! Damn it!
I can't stop howling at night. It really affects my sleep, so what should I do?
I've been eyeing the robber's money bag for a long time, but when I was ready to strike, the bag flew away by itself!
Invisibility is so convenient. Heh heh heh, if you can keep a secret for me, I can share a little with you.
As my body grows larger each day, the broken dragon egg is no longer enough to protect me.
I had just emerged from the earth when my owner disappeared. I'm a little lonely now.
I've been guarding this place for 87 years. I need someone to pour some water on me, please!
I've heard that if a very powerful knight can point me in the right direction, I can become very powerful in no time!
I heard you had a dream about the Battle of Creation? Can you tell me about your dreams?
Can you answer me what is really good and what is really evil?
Do you know who I am? It's a great honor for you to be my companion!

1. Adventure Portal has a total of 7 stages, and each will be unlocked while any hero i your bag reaches the level requirement. Clear the stages to get rich Gold and Hero EXP.
 2. Clear a stage to unlock the Blitz function of it and also the next difficulty mode.
 3. There are 2 free Blitz attempts for each dungeon. Challenges cost no Blitz attempts.
 4. The number of Blitz attempts will reset to 2 at 05:00 every day.

1. Please select a craftable hero first, then place in usable material heroes to craft a hero.
 2. There are requirements on the material heroes in quality, number, and class.
 3. A newly crafted hero will be reset to Lv.1.
 4. All Runes carried by the material heroes will be auto-removed and placed in your Bag after the crafting.
 5. If a material hero is above Lv.1, all consumables used to level it up will be 100% returned.

System Rules:
1. In the Point Match, you can fight players on your own server or other servers (Cross-server must be unlocked first) to earn Arena Points.
2. You have free chances every day, and you can spend diamonds to buy more. You can refresh opponents for free without limitation.
3. Each season lasts 14 days (the time of the first Cross-server Season will be corrected to a unified World Season time. The two times are slightly different). The first time you attend a Cross-server Season, you will immediately earn a Server Season Reward (whether or not the current Cross-server Season is being settled).
4. At the end of each season, all players' points are reduced to 70% of their current points, with a minimum of 1000 points (initial points).

Event Rules:
1. Players with a similar amount of points and rankings will be matched for competition.
2. If the challenger wins, he earns points, and the opponent loses points. But if the challenger loses, the points of both sides remain unchanged.
3. The more points your opponent has, the more points you earn after winning the challenge, and vice versa.
4. In the Point Match, your defense lineup will be challenged.

Reward Rules
1. After each challenge, you earn a chance to draw random rewards. Arena Points can be exchanged for items from the Arena Store.
2. The first time you attend a Cross-server Season, you will immediately earn a Server Season Reward. After that, you will only get Cross-server Daily Rewards and Cross-server Season Rewards.

Fantasia Tower: 
1. Keep improving your strength and optimizing your lineup to reach higher floors. 
2. Floors can only be unlocked one by one. 
3. You will get rich rewards based on the number of floors you have cleared. 
Shadow Tower Dominator: 
1. Clear all the stages in the previous chapter to unlock the next chapter. 
2. Unlocking a new chapter requires to get a given number of stars in the previous chapter. 
3. Complete the star level objectives in each chapter to earn rich rewards.

1. Here you can dismiss useless heroes for resources.
 2. Duplicate heroes can be used to upgrade, ascend, and craft heroes. Think wise before you dismiss them.
 3. It will return corresponding Hero EXP based on the quality and level of the dismissed hero cards, and there will be a loss in proportion.
 4. Dismissing an advanced hero will get extra Advance Stones.
 5. Dismissing an A or above hero will get extra SoulEmber.
 6. SoulEmber can be used to buy heroes in SoulEmber Store.

Complete Hero Expedition to earn Expedition Tokens, which can be exchanged for rich rewards in Mystery Store. 

1. Hero Expedition has a total of 15 stages, which can be unlocked one by one.
 2. Challenge stages in different difficulty modes to earn corresponding stars.
 3. After selecting a star level difficulty, you can no longer change the current stage's difficulty.
 4. Accumulate stars to earn phase rewards.
 5. Character HP will be inherited after challenging a stage.
 6. Stages and rewards reset once every 48 hours.

1. Commission Reset refreshes at 05:00 every day.
 2. Daily Free Chances refreshes at 05:00 every day.
 3. It will delete all unstarted quests and get 6 new quests after each refresh.
 4. A total of 30 quests in progress and completed quests can be stored.

1. Here you can use Treasure Tokens to get a random item reward.
 2. Each Basic Treasure Hunt costs Treasure Tokens and gives you various item and Rune rewards.
 3. Each Adv. Treasure Hunt costs Adv. Treasure Tokens and gives you better item and Rune rewards.
 4. Reach the give number of Treasure Hunts to win the jackpot next time. A recount will start after that.
 5. You can claim a corresponding chest based on the number of Treasure Hunts you have made, and the progress resets at 05:00 each Monday.
 6. Unlocked but unclaimed chests will be reset too. Remember to claim them on time.

1. A [Void Boss] will respawn each week, when players across the server can challenge it together.
 2. After defeating [Void Boss], the highest damage dealer will be the first [World Overlord], and all participants will get rewards and initial points based on their rankings.
 3. Within a week, players can defeat the [World Overlord] to deprive [Dark Rune Shards]. When all 10 shards are taken away, the player with the highest points except the [Former World Overlord] will become the new [World Overlord].
 4. The former [World Overlord] can take back the [Dark Rune Shards] through revenge. If a certain number of shards are taken away in a row and now revenge in initiated, it will enter protection for a period of time.

1. A set effect can be auto-activated after all-over Runes are enhanced to +3, +6, +9, and +12 respectively. 
2. After all-over Runes (minimum 1-star) are enhanced to +3, the star level set will be auto-activated. 
2. Activating the set stats needs 6 Runes. 
3. The activation of enhanced set stats is subject to the lowest enhancement level of the equipped Rune. 
4. The activation of star level set stats is subject to the lowest star level of the equipped Runes.

Shadow Stone Defense - the place where every Byanisian hero yearns for. Only by accepting the cruel test behind "Shadow Stone Defense" and bringing back the Rune that symbolizes courage and strength can a hero be recognized by the Glorious Guards - the greatest warriors of all mankind.
 There are 3 free challenges per day. Unused challenges can be reserved for the next day, and the max number of challenges is 9.
--Rules: 
1.     Tank Dungeon: Available on MON, SAT, and SUN, drops Runes of all classes for Slot 2 and 3.
2.     Mage Dungeon: Available on TUE, SAT, and SUN, drops Runes of all classes for Slot 1 and 5.
3.     Warrior Dungeon: Available on WED, SAT, and SUN, drops Runes of all classes for Slot 2 and 4.
4.     Assassin Dungeon: Available on THU, SAT, and SUN, drops Runes of all classes for Slot 1 and 6.
5.     Archer Dungeon: Available on FRI, SAT, and SUN, drops Runes of all classes for Slot 3, 4, 5 and 6.
--Clear conditions: 
Reach the SS rating to unlock the next stage.
--Dungeon stages and rewards: 
Reach a certain rating to earn a corresponding Rune Chest. Reaching the same rating repeatedly cannot earn the reward again.

Preface: In a distant country there is a forbidden spell that can link human souls through a certain way, and then enhance the abilities of the linkee to be consistent with the linker.
 1. The 6 highest level heroes are auto-added to the Soul Link as linkers. If two heroes are at the same level, then the one with higher Power will be added. The level of the lowest level linker decides the level of the linkees.
 2. Hero star level remains unchanged, and their level is still subject to their own level cap.
 3. Linkers in Soul Link can star up or deployed in other features, but they cannot be upgraded, advanced, or dismissed.
 3. Tap a hero avatar to remove the hero, after that, the hero slot will enter a 24h CD. You can only place another hero after the CD is over or you use diamonds to remove the CD.
 4.Soul Link Power is the sum of the best ever Power of the 6 linker heroes.

1. Hunting Ground is divided into 5 classes, and each class is divided into different levels. Each level gives corresponding Soul Stones. The higher the level, the higher the hunting difficulty.
2. After selecting the class, you can jump to the unlocked level.
3. Each player has 2 free attempts every day, a successful challenge costs 1 attempt, and a failed challenge costs no attempt. After the free attempts are depleted, you can use Search Warrant to continue the challenge. Free attempts are restored at 05:00 every day.
4. Searching for Gottsumon in Advanced Hunting Ground has a chance of getting Runes, max 2 times per day; if you have activated the subscription privilege, the value will increase to 3 times per day.
5. Reach account Lv.60 to unlock the Blitz feature. You can Blitz a max of 10 times per day to directly get the corresponding rewards, and the Blitz attempts reset at 05:00 every day.

1. Void Lords take on challenges in 3-day rotation, and the leaderboard resets every day.
2. When the max damage across the full server exceeds a certain value, the next Void Lord will upgrade and get higher stats. The player who makes this happen will be displayed in Lord Evolution and the evolution rewards can be claimed by all players in the server.
3. Each player has 5 challenges per day, and the attempts reset at 05:00 the next day.
4. The shift takes place from 04:00-05:00 every day. The leaderboard is settled at 04:00 based on player damage, and the rewards will be issued via mail based on player ranking.
5. The highest damage reward will be issued immediately after the battle, and resets at 05:00 every day.
6. If the Void Lord gets killed, it will revive with stronger abilities. Optimize your lineup to deal higher damage.

Wished Recruit: 
1. The probability of drawing rare heroes from Wished Recruit and Adv. Recruit is the same.
2. You can select 3 heroes for Wished Recruit.
3. When you draw a 5-star hero, it has 30% chance to be one of the 3 wish heroes.
4. Select 3 heroes at the same time to complete <color=#ff0000>locking them (cannot be changed after locking)</color>.
The 3 heroes must be of different classes.
5. If you draw all the 3 wish heroes, the event will be closed.
6. In a Wished Recruit Card Pool, when you draw a 5-star hero, 
it has a 30% chance to be one of the wish heroes.
 7. You are guaranteed to draw a 4-star or above hero upon 10 draws.

Feature info: 
1. Team Purgatory has a total of 5 themed fields, namely: Warrior Field, Mage Field, Assassin Field, Tank Field, and Archer Field. They are available in 2-day rotation. Different fields require you to deploy at least a specified number of heroes with their class corresponding to the theme.
 2. You need to take on 15 waves of challenges in each stage until all your heroes are defeated, during which your heroes cannot restore their state.
 3. There is no limit on the number of challenges, and you need to clear wave 15 in order to unlock the next stage.
 4. After the current themed field is over, the stage where you haven't cleared all the 15 waves will be reset, and you need to challenge it again (rewards can only be claimed once)

Reward info:              
 1. Rankings are based on the number of stages and waves you have cleared in the themed field on the day. If two players achieve the same score, then the one who achieves it first will rank higher. Rewards will be issued via mail based on your ranking.
 2. The leaderboard will be reset for each shift, when you need to challenge the field again to make the list.
 3. Wave 5, 10, and 15 in each stage drops abundant development materials and corresponding class rewards, and each reward can only be claimed once.

1. Only the 6 highest Power heroes in your Bag will be recorded (the same as Soul Link Power).
 2. It only records Best Ever Power.
 3. If two players have the same Power, the one who achieves the Power first will rank higher.
4. The player who takes first to reach the specified Power in this server will be displayed in the reward list, and the progress reward can be claimed by all players in the server.
5. Tap the View Details button to check the specific time when the top 5 players of this server reached the given Power.

1. It records the Best Ever Arena Points players have scored in current season.
 2. If two players have the same Arena Points, the one who achieves the value first will rank higher.
3. The player who takes first to reach the specified points in this server will be displayed in the reward list, and the progress reward can be claimed by all players in the server.
4. Tap the View Details button to check the specific time when the top 5 players of this server reached the given points.
 5. The leaderboard will be reset after the season (14 days) is settled.

1. It records the floor players have reached in Fantasia Tower.
 2. If two players have reached the same floor, the one who achieves it first will rank higher.
3. The player who takes first to reach the specified floor in this server will be displayed in the reward list, and the progress reward can be claimed by all players in the server.
4. Tap the View Details button to check the specific time when the top 5 players of this server reached the given floor.

1. It records the number of stars players have obtained in Dark Tower Dominator. 
2. If two players have obtained the same number of stars, the one who achieves it first will rank higher.
3. The player who takes first to reach the specific number of stars in this server will be displayed in the reward list, and the progress reward can be claimed by all players in the server.
4. Tap the View Details button to check the specific time when the top 5 players of this server reached the given number of stars.

1. It records the highest tier players have reached in Ranked Match. 
2. If two players have obtained the same number of stars, the one who achieves it first will rank higher.
3. The player who takes first to reach the specific number of stars in this server will be displayed in the reward list, and the progress reward can be claimed by all players in the server.
4. Tap the View Details button to check the specific time when the top 5 players of this server reached the given number of stars.
 5. The leaderboard will be reset after the season is settled.

1. It records the current progress of players in Warrior Campaign. 
2. If two players have made the same progress, the one who achieves it first will rank higher.
3. The player who takes first to reach the specific progress in this server will be displayed in the reward list, and the progress reward can be claimed by all players in the server.
4. Tap the View Details button to check the specific time when the top 5 players of this server reached the given progress.

[Rules]: 
1. Each player can only claim one tier of rewards.
 2. The leaderboard event is settled at 23:59 and the rewards will be issued via mail. Scores will not be counted after the event is over.
 3. [Hero Contest] It only records the 6 different heroes with the highest star level (heroes who are initially below 5-star, dismissed, and ascended are not counted).
 4. [Hero Contest] You must meet the <Hero Star Level Ranking> and <Hero Star Level Requirement> in order to claim the corresponding rewards.
 5. [Tower Ascension] You must meet the <Fantasia Tower Floor Ranking> and <Fantasia Tower Floor Requirement> in order to claim the corresponding rewards.
 6. In the case of the same ranking, the one who achieves it first will rank higher.

Star level rules: 
1. Star up an initially 5-star hero to the specified star level to get corresponding Star Sources and rewards.
2. The star-up reward can be claimed only once for the identical hero.
3. Tier 3 stars requirement (6/7/8 or more)
Rules of obtaining Star Sources: 
1. Star Sources can be obtained through hero star-up. 
2. Collect a certain number of Star Sources to claim a phase reward, and the jackpot is a legendary hero.
If the first purchase is a 7-day weekly privilege, the permanent weekly privilege discount will disappear; after the first purchase, you can renew the 7-day weekly privilege.
If the first purchase is a 30-day Monthly Pass, the Quarterly Pass discount will disappear; after the first purchase, you can renew the 30-day Monthly Pass.

1. Participate in Elite Match to get ranked.
2. Rankings are based on the progress. The further you go, the higher your ranking will be; In condition of the same progress, the one who scores more Tryout Points will rank higher.
 3. Rewards will be issued based on rankings at the end of the match.
 4. The leaderboard will be updated at the end of each season.

1. Participate in Elite Match to get ranked.
2. Rankings are based on Tryout Points.
3. After the Tryout is over, the top ranked 64 players will advance to Final 64.

1. Participate in Glorious Arena: Point Match to get ranked.
2. Rankings are based on Point Match Points.

Basic Rules 
1. Elite Match takes <color=#FFE8C6>3 days</color> as a season, and the first match starts on <color=#FFE8C6>day 3 after server launch</color>.
2. Schedule: 6 Tryouts on day 1, No.65-256 in Total Points will be eliminated; 6 Knockouts on day 2.
3. When the Tryout starts, the top 256 ranked players in Point Match will automatically get the qualification.
4. Each round of match is divided into a Preparation Phase, a Support Phase and a Battle Phase. The battle is a 1v1 match. The side that deals higher damage wins when the battle is over.

Tryout Rules
1. The Tryout starts on <color=#FFE8C6>day 1</color>, a total of 6 matches.
2. It lasts a whole day, and can be challenged at any time on the day.
3. You will earn corresponding points based on the result and your performance.
4. The Total Points is the sum of Battle Points and a certain percentage of Point Match Ranking Points. The top 64 ranked players in Total Points will advance to the Knockout.

Knockout Rules
1. The Knockout starts with 8 groups after the Tryout is over, and it's composed of Final 32/16/8/4 and the Final.
 2. The loser of each match will be eliminated to end up with the 1st place, 2nd place, and 3rd place.
3. Other players will be ranked based on their Total Tryout Points.

Match Guessing
1. After each round of match starts, you can guess the winner. If the player you pick wins, the guessing is successful, and vice versa.
 2. The match for guessing is determined by the system. When the Guessing Phase starts, the system will issue a Guessing Coin Box to you.
3. If your <color=#FFE8C6>Guessing</color> is right, you will get corresponding Guessing Coins at related odds; if your Guessing is wrong, you will lose the Guessing Coins you have laid.
4. After the Elite Match is over, your Guessing Coins will be automatically exchanged for Arena Coins at a ratio of 10:1, which can be exchanged for items in Arena Store

Cross-server Rules
1. On <color=#FFE8C6>day 15</color> after the server launch, the participants of Elite Match will be changed from the top 256 ranked players in Point Match to <color=#FFE8C6>the top 256 ranked players in Cross-server Point Match</color>.
2. Time is changed to 2 fixed seasons per week, which start on <color=#FFE8C6>Tuesday</color> and <color=#FFE8C6>Friday</color> respectively.

Issue Rewards
After the Elite Match, rewards will be issued via mail to all participants.

1. After the reward is claimed, the next reward will start countdown.
 2. The reward list refreshes at 05:00 every day.
 3. Rewards need to be claimed manually.

*During the event, <color=#00fff0>Idle (including Idle Speedup)</color> may drop limited-time Christmas items [Missing Socks], which can be exchanged for the limited skin <color=#00fff0>Snowy Xmas - Bellows.</color>.
* [Missing Socks] can be exchanged for rewards in [Xmas Exchange].
* After the event ends, [Xmas Exchange] will be available for 1 more day.
* After [Xmas Exchange] ends, [Missing Socks] will be recycled and can no longer be used.

*During the event, Idle (including Idle Speedup) may drop limited-time Christmas items [Rat Spirit's Fork], which can be exchanged for limited value rewards.
* [Rat Spirit's Fork] can be exchanged for rewards in [Surprise Exchange].
* After the event ends, [Surprise Exchange] will be available for 1 more day.
* After [Surprise Exchange] ends, [Rat Spirit's Forks] will be recycled and can no longer be used.

*During the event, Idle (including Idle Speedup) may drop limited-time item [HiBuy Coins], which can be exchanged for limited value rewards.
* [HiBuy Coins] can be exchanged for rewards in [HiBuy Treasure Hunt].
* After the event ends, [HiBuy Treasure Hunt] will be available for 1 more day.
* After [HiBuy Treasure Hunt] ends, [HiBuy Coins] will be recycled and can no longer be used.

1. During the event, from Idle you can get [HiBuy Coins], which can be used to draw rewards in [HiBuy Exchange].
 2. There are 3 optional prize pools. You can pick 3 prizes for the lottery draw. You cannot draw if you haven't picked a prize; 
3. During the process, you can change your picked prizes at will. There is a limit on the pick attempts of some rewards. If you run out of the pick attempts of an item, you need to pick another item that has sufficient pick attempts.
 4. You can use [diamonds] to draw rewards 20 times per day;
5. Each draw gives you [HiBuy Point]*10; [HiBuy Points] can be exchanged for limited items in [Exchange Store]; After the event ends, [Exchange Store] will be closed, and [HiBuy Points] will be converted into [Gold] at a ratio of 1:5,000, and [HiBuy Coins] will be converted into [Gold] at a ratio of 1:250. Remember to use them on time.
6. Probabilities:
*Adv. Rewards:
1%
*Int. Rewards:
2.5%
 *Basic Rewards:
6.5%
*Other Rewards:
Adv. Recruit Book x1: 12%, 4-star Optional Class Hero Card x1: 5.5%, Advance Stone x100: 27.62%, Rune Dust x600: 27.62%, Enhance Spar x1: 17.26%

Adv. Recruit: 
1. Chance to get all heroes of this version (except for new heroes).
2. You have a free summon per day, which resets at 05:00 every day.
Free summon attempts don't stack.
3. You are guaranteed to get a 4-star or above hero upon 10 draws.
4. Probabilities please see below: 
<color=#feef00>5-star: 4.60%</color>
<color=#c600ff>4-star: 18.40%</color>
<color=#0084ff>3-star: 77.00%</color>

Themed Recruit: 
1. The probability of drawing rare heroes from New Hero Recruit and Adv. Recruit is the same.
 2. In a Themed Recruit Card Pool, when you draw a 5-star hero, 
it has a 30% chance to be one of the 5-star themed heroes in the card pool.
 3. The total probability of drawing original 5-star heroes remains unchanged.
 4. You are guaranteed to draw a 4-star or above hero upon every 10 draws.

Timed New Hero Recruit: 
1. The probability of drawing rare heroes from Timed New Hero Recruit and 
Adv. Recruit is the same.
2. When you draw a 5-star hero from the Themed Recruit, it has a 30% chance to be UP hero. 
The probability of drawing each UP hero is the same (the total probability of drawing original 5-star heroes remains unchanged).
3. You are guaranteed to draw a 4-star or above hero upon every 10 draws.
4. You can only use exclusive Recruit Tickets to draw heroes from New Hero Themed Recruit.
5. You are guaranteed to draw the new hero upon 100 draws in New Hero Recruit.

Competition rules: 
1. Ranked Match takes place in the cross-server, where all servers are divided into different regions, and players in the same region can be matched.
 2. Each Ranked Match season lasts a certain number of days (details please see the season time on the panel); after the season is over, rewards will be settled based on your tier.
 3. Each win gives you the ranked star, which can be used to increase your tier; you can claim the tier rewards for the first time you reach a new tier in each season. Tier rewards reset at the end of each season.
 4. At set intervals, you can get a Tier Idle reward based on your current tier. The higher your tier, the better the reward.

 Matching rules: 
1. You can get free matching attempts every day; after that, you need to buy them.
 2. Players at similar tier will be randomly matched.
 3. After the match is successful, you can access to the Lineup phase. Reach the specified tier to unlock [Lineup]. For details, please refer to the Lineup tab.
 4. Unused challenges and purchases will stack, max 10 attempts.

 Tier Protection Points: 
1. You can get a certain number of Protection Points from both victories and failures; if you fail, Protection Points will be deducted to prevent you from losing a star; conversely, when your tier Protection Points go to full, you will get 1 extra star.

1. The number of different heroes in the Bag must be 6
2. Both sides' tier is Platinum IV
3. Both sides deploy heroes in a random order, and after that, they can alternately line up for 3 rounds.
 Number of heroes to deploy: Sente 132; Gote: 231.
 4. Heroes deployed in previous rounds will be locked.

Competition rules:
1. Summit Match starts regularly every day (for details, see the screen), and players who have reached the [Master] tier can participate in it. If your tier is below [Master], you will lose the qualification for Summit Match temporarily until you reach Master again.
 2. Players will receive initial Summit Pts when they qualify for the Summit Match for the first time in a season, and the points will only change in this mode.
 3. The regions of Summit Match and Ranked Match are the same.
 4. The season schedules can be viewed on the screen. At the end of the season, rewards will be given based on Summit Match Pts Rankings. After the settlement, Summit Pts will be reset to the initial points.
 5. After each battle, the winner will be awarded points according to the points difference of the two players and earn ranked stars to increase tier.
 6. If [Arena: Elite Match] Final 64 is in progress on the day, then Summit Match won't take place.

 Matching rules:
1. There is no limit on the number of matching attempts in Summit Match.
 2. Players with similar Summit Pts will be randomly matched.
 3. After the match is successful, you can access to [Lineup]. For details, please refer to the Lineup tab.

 Tier Protection Pts: 
1. During Summit Match, Tier Protection Pts for each single match will double.

1. Idle Resource Hall is a welfare organization established by the Association of Adventurers since ancient times to help solve the shortage of resources in the course of adventure. You are the Hall Master, and all your heroes are members of the hall, and they provide a certain percentage of blessing bonus for your resources.
 2. You gain resources based on your current Idle level at regular intervals, up to a maximum of 12-hour resource output.
 3. There are a total of 5 Resource Boost Halls, which can boost the output of 5 core resources from Idle. You can appoint a hero to each hall to activate idle bonuses. However, there is a limit to the bonus per hall.

1. Heroes can be appointed as Pontiffs or members.
 2. When appointed as the Pontiff of a specific hall, some heroes provide extra bonuses.
 3. When demoted to members, Exclusive Pontiffs no longer enjoy Exclusive Pontiff Bonuses, and they only enjoy Member Bonuses.
 4. The higher the hero's star level, the greater the bonus (0.5% bonus for each star below 8-star and 1% bonus for each star since 8-star).
 5. The hero's star level is based on the highest record they have ever reached and is not affected by dismissal.

Rules:
1. Select a floor of the tower and start battle, and the hero will automatically fight the first monster on the floor.
 2. If your hero's stats are no less than your monster's, you win, and vice versa.
 3. After you win, the stats will be added to the monster's original stats.
 4. You can then choose between the current floor and the adjacent upper and lower floors to continue the challenge.
 5. After all the monsters in the tower are defeated, the next tower will appear. After clearing all the towers, you will win.
 Reward:
1. Each time you clear a stage for the first time, you get a clearance reward.
 2. There is no reward for repeated challenges.

I. Basic Rules
1. Season cycle: Every 4 rounds (1 round per week) is a season
2. Opening conditions: guild level 3, guild members 5, 
3. Registration conditions: 3 Gates and 5 main Strongholds (Barracks, Tavern, Store, Pharmacy, Statue) are guarded by members.
 4. Gates and Strongholds: 
Gates: The guards at the gate have concluded a life link with the city gate and enjoy the city gate buff, and they will revive repeatedly unless you breach the city gate. Gate HP=Guards HP*Gate Buff*Cheer Buff
Strongholds: Divided into Main Strongholds (Barracks, Tavern, Store, Pharmacy, Statue) and Common Strongholds (House 1-10). Plundering main strongholds will get additional bonuses.
 5. Cheer: Members can spend gold or diamonds to cheer in Guild War for the 3 city gates, giving them an HP buff. Refreshes each round.
 II. Battle Cycle
1. Preparation Phase (MON, 24H): 
Guild members can adjust hero lineup during this period and cheer for their guilds.
 2. Defense Organizing Phase (TUE, 24H): 
During the period, guild leaders can organize defense and adjust teams guarding the gates and strongholds. Submit Guild War registration (guilds without registration will miss this Guild War)
3. Offense Phase (WED to FRI, 72H): 
During this period, guild members can attack the enemy gates and strongholds and plunder points.
 III. Battle Rules: 
1. You must breach the city gate before you can attack the guild stronghold. 
2. You can challenge each city gate 2 times per day, and you can use diamonds to buy challenge attempts. You can challenge the stronghold once per day, and cannot buy challenge attempts.
 3. City Gate Challenge progress can be inherited and shared with all guild members. Stronghold Challenge progress is individual.
 IV. Points Rules: 
1. If you successfully challenge the stronghold, you can get corresponding guild points and personal points (attacking the city gate will proportionally get personal points based on your damage ranking).
 2. After guild members clear all strongholds, they can get additional guild points and personal points.
 3. Corresponding guild points will be deducted when a gate is breached.
 4. Corresponding guild points will be deducted when a stronghold is occupied by the enemy guild.

1. PvE is done automatically when you are online and will continue after you log out.
 2. During the process, if you take another action, Auto PvE will be canceled with time not paused.
 3. Invite 1 player to increase the speed by 3.5 times, and invite 2 players to increase the speed by 4 times.
 4. The room owner uses items and lead the team in PvE while teammates need to use nothing.
 5. Team up to get Friendship Points.

1. In Hall of Fame Challenge, the stages are ranked in terms of Least Turns, Lowest Power, Highest DMG, and Fastest Clear.
 2. The total leaderboard of Hall of Fame is based on the number of stage leaderboard 1, stage leaderboard 2, stage leaderboard 3... and so on.
 3. Challenging the latest stage costs no challenge attempt no matter it's a victory or defeat. Each repeated challenge of a cleared stage costs a challenge attempt.
 4. Rank first in Total Leaderboard to get the one-week Hall of Fame: Champion Avatar Frame.
 5. The top 10 ranked players in Total Leaderboard will get different amounts of rare hero shards based on their rankings.

1,000 years ago, all kinds of races in the world fought for the Genesis Rune, leading to the War of Chaos.# After fierce battles, Human won the Genesis Rune in the end.# When they returned triumphantly, Dragons took the chance and launched attack on the Human Federation.# Facing the super powerful Black Dragon King - Garcon, Humans found no way to beat him.# In the end, Carville the Shield of Glory sacrificed his life to hold up Genesis Rune and managed to repel the Black Dragon King.# The Genesis Rune, with power depleted, was split into two - Light and Dark.# The Dark Rune was hidden in the skyrim, and the world began to fall apart.# The scramble for Genesis Rune was ignited again.

First, you need to know the strength of your opponent and make sure that the hero you choose is no less powerful than the opponent's.
Pay attention to the opponent's hero class, and wisely deploy your hero. The example above shows the advantages and disadvantages among classes.
Tanks and Warriors have high health and can take damage for teammates. Deploy DPS heroes in the rear and Tanks and Warriors in the front row to take damage.
Mages and Archers deal high AoE damage, but they have low health. Please make sure they are away from enemy attacks.

Assassins are a vital presence for your team. They have low health but can exterminate the enemy. Therefore, please make sure they are not attacked in early battle, so they can deal huge damage later.
If the opponent is out of your attack range, tap the movable hero to the appropriate position and try to attack with skills.
When attacking, select a skill, you will see the skill release range (red tiles), then select a target (yellow tiles) to cast the skill!
The glowing green tiles are the effective area of Buffs/Healings. Cast skills to buff or heal your teammates!
Master your skills to become a battle master! Long tap the skill icon to view skill details. Go to know the details of the skills and strike the opponent with precision!
Before moving a hero, you'd better check which hero will make the next attack, which will help you make the right decisions on the battlefield.
Claim Idle rewards to get rich EXP, which can help you develop fast! Idle Rewards can be accumulated for up to 10 hours. Remember to claim them on time!
It's not enough to just upgrade character and heroes but also skills, which will make you more stronger!

Please note! Runes of the same type and star level may have different stats. Choose the right Rune for your hero!
Please note! 4 Runes with the same type and star level can be crafted into 1 Rune with star level increased by +1.
There are free attempts for Ancient Ruins every day. You can get a lot of rewards by challenging it. Remember to use them up!
Duplicate heroes can be used for to ascend or craft heroes. Useless heroes can be dismissed for resources.
You can view the max level stats and skill info of unobtained heroes in HeroAlbum.

If a stage is difficult, you can try manual combat. If you clear a stage with low Power, the battle will have a chance to be listed in Lineup Hall of Fame.
Upgrade Rune star level and enhance level to activate the set effect and gain additional bonuses.
You can compete with other players in Summit Ranked for Crown Chests.
The higher the Idle level, the more rewards you will get. Remember to upgrade it! Activate Subscription Privileges to increase Idle drops!
